Rulings.Tengu:
● You can activate this card even if your opponent controls no monsters.
● If no card is returned to the hand, no monster is destroyed.

Rulings.Cat:
● 'Hero Blast' targets 1 'Elemental Hero' Normal Monster in your GY.
● You can activate 'Hero Blast' when you opponent doesn't have any face-up monsters.
● If the selected 'Elemental Hero' Normal Monster isn't returned to your hand, you can't destroy 1 of your opponent's cards.'
●

Rulings.Base: 1. "Hero Blast" targets 1 "Elemental Hero" Normal Monster in your GY.\n2. You can activate "Hero Blast" when you opponent doesn't have any face-up monsters.\n3. If the selected "Elemental Hero" Normal Monster is not returned to your hand, you cannot destroy 1 of your opponent's cards."

PSCT.Tengu:
① Target 1 "Elemental HERO" Normal Monster in your GY; 
add that target to your hand, then if your opponent controls any monsters with ATK less than or equal to that target's ATK, destroy 1 of them.
